name: Disinfection (Glarioos)
description:
You've been sneezed on! But it's not too late! The 60 second rule states you've 60 seconds before infection. Use your sensor to find the bacteria and viruses and use your syringe to kill them.

---

This game does not represent how these type of things work in the real world, obviously.

---

This made was made for the TriJam #122.

The themes were transformation and micro things. The micro things (viruses and bacteria) will transform you into a sick person , and not the good type.

The game was made in about 5 hours, including all graphics and sounds, and it's the first game I've finished.
